amendment.description: To provide certain funding for operating grants for Tribally Controlled Community Colleges, and for Information Resources Technology.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1763 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1763 proposed by Senator Burns. (consideration: CR S11813-11814; text: CR S11814) To provide certain funding for operating grants for Tribally Controlled Community Colleges, and for Information Resources Technology.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1763 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1763 proposed by Senator Burns.
